sentences: Position Type : Full time
Type Of Hire : Experienced (relevant combo of work and education)
Education Desired : Bachelor of Computer Engineering
Travel Percentage : 0%

Are you curious, motivated, engaging and forward-thinking? At FIS you’ll have the opportunity to work on some of the most challenging and relevant products in financial services using a wide range of technologies
Our talented people empower us, and we believe that a focused team that is open, collaborative, passionate and fun is the key to the company’s success
About the team:
Engineers at Worldpay from FIS are a talented, creative group working together to build the next generation of payment products
Our clients range from small/medium businesses start-ups to some of the largest tech and digital firms
Worldpay is a place where learning and growing are core parts of the journey
We care deeply about things like best practices, automation, test driven development and agile ways of working
What you will be doing:
Embrace a DevOps mindset while collaborating with your cross-functional team to design, develop, operate, test, support and improve the products our customers use
You will work with the wider engineering teams to bring solutions to challenges that require cross team collaboration
As a team member you will be exposed to the latest standards in the payment card industry, security best practices and integrations with external partners
Main responsibilities:
Collaboratively develop the features and engineering capabilities for the products your team own
We aim to employ automation for everything
Collaborate in all stages of development from defining requirements with the Product Owner to building and running the service on the company infrastructure
Join the on-call rota once a month to ensure the high availability of the products developed by your team
Input and drive decisions around technologies, patterns, and approaches to adopt in collaboration with your fellow engineers from other teams
What you will need:
Experience building and delivering microservices in Java
Experience in using a Linux operating system (bash commands)
Database systems knowledge - Oracle SQL
An engineering skillset that is focused on quality and a test first philosophy
An agile mindset focused on work prioritization and team collaboration
An inquisitive personality that is always looking for constant improvement opportunities
Bonus if you have:
Experience with Continuous Delivery, Jenkins, Nexus or other similar tools
Experience with OpenShift and Kubernetes
Experience with a BDD testing framework
Experience with SpringBoot, Spring or Apache
Experience with Kafka or any other messaging systems
Exposure to the Payments industry
Security and encryption standards, familiarity with OWASP Top 10
Oracle PL/SQL
What we offer you:
A career at FIS is more than just a job
It’s the change to shape the future of fintech
At FIS, we offer you:
A voice in the future of fintech
Always-on learning and development
Collaborative work environment
